# ClearFlow

> Compose type-safe flows for emergent AI.

## Quick Start

- [Install from PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/clearflow/): pip install clearflow

## Documentation

- [README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/README.md)
- [Core API](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/clearflow/__init__.py): Complete implementation - Node, NodeResult, Flow, and exceptions in a single module
- [CLAUDE Guidelines](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/CLAUDE.md): This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repositor

## Examples

- [Chat](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/examples/chat/README.md): Simple conversational flow with OpenAI integration
- [Portfolio Analysis](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/examples/portfolio_analysis/README.md): Simple conversational flow with OpenAI integration
- [RAG Pipeline](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/examples/rag/README.md): Simple conversational flow with OpenAI integration

## Testing

- [Error Handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/tests/test_error_handling.py): Test error handling and edge cases for ClearFlow
- [Flow Tests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/tests/test_flow.py): Test Flow orchestration features of ClearFlow
- [Flow Validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/tests/test_flow_builder_validation.py): Test flow builder validation for reachability and duplicate routes
- [Node Tests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/tests/test_node.py): Test Node abstraction features of ClearFlow
- [Type Transformations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/tests/test_type_transformations.py): Test type transformation features of ClearFlow

## Optional

- [Migration Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/MIGRATION.md): This guide covers breaking changes and migration steps for ClearFlow v1.0.
- [License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/artificial-sapience/ClearFlow/main/LICENSE): MIT License
